abstract.t: Peer-to-peer (P2P) applications have become widely used on theInternet today and make up a large portion of the traffic in manynetworks. One technique to improve the network efficiency of P2Papplications is to introduce storage capabilities within the network.The DECADE Working Group has been formed with the goal of developingan architecture to provide this capability. This document presentsan architecture, discusses the underlying principles and identifiescore components and protocols supporting the architecture.
